document_data.name: Amanir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Amanir''' were a clan of [[cloud giant]]s that existed during the time of [[Netheril]].
document_data.Base of Operations: This clan lived in the northern [[Channel Mountains]], where they acted as the leaders of a community of cloud giants.
document_data.History:
In {{YearlinkConvert|1417|NY}}, this clan of giants began trade relationships with Netheril's waterborne city [[Harborage]]..

In {{YearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, when Harborage was falling apart as a result of a volcanic rift created just outside the city's walls by [[phaerimm]], the Amanir clan arrived with their [[cloud palace]] and saved around five thousand residents.
document_data.Members: This clan was made up of around forty members, who all had expertise in spellcasting.
